actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt the Federal excise tax on distilled spirits ethanol used as a solvent for compounds used in environmental monitoring activities.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt ethanol from the Federal excise tax on distilled spirits when it is used as a solvent for compounds used in subsurface environmental monitoring activities.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt the Federal excise tax on distilled spirits ethanol used as a solvent for compounds used in environmental monitoring activities.
